original_solution_mapping.L1: There are 100 cents in each $1 so $5 gives 5*100 cents = <<5*100=500>>500 cents
original_solution_mapping.L2: To recover her capital of 500 cents from a selling price of 20 cents per egg she has to sell 500/20 = <<500/20=25>>25 eggs
original_solution_mapping.L3: There were 30 eggs in the crate to start with so she will have 30-25 = <<30-25=5>>5 eggs left

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 4612.
    Returns: the number of eggs Samantha will have left after recovering her capital.
    """
    # L1
    dollars_capital = 5 # $5
    cents_per_dollar = 100 # 100 cents in each $1
    total_cents_capital = dollars_capital * cents_per_dollar

    # L2
    selling_price_per_egg_cents = 20 # 20 cents
    eggs_to_sell_to_recover_capital = total_cents_capital / selling_price_per_egg_cents

    # L3
    initial_eggs = 30 # 30 eggs
    eggs_left = initial_eggs - eggs_to_sell_to_recover_capital

    # FA
    answer = eggs_left
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: There are {cents_per_dollar} cents in each $1 so ${dollars_capital} gives {dollars_capital}*{cents_per_dollar} cents = <<{dollars_capital}*{cents_per_dollar}={total_cents_capital}>>{total_cents_capital} cents

To recover her capital of {total_cents_capital} cents from a selling price of {selling_price_per_egg_cents} cents per egg she has to sell {total_cents_capital}/{selling_price_per_egg_cents} = <<{total_cents_capital}/{selling_price_per_egg_cents}={eggs_to_sell_to_recover_capital}>>{eggs_to_sell_to_recover_capital} eggs

There were {initial_eggs} eggs in the crate to start with so she will have {initial_eggs}-{eggs_to_sell_to_recover_capital} = <<{initial_eggs}-{eggs_to_sell_to_recover_capital}={eggs_left}>>{eggs_left} eggs left

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: There are 100 cents in each $1 so $5 gives 5*100 cents = <<5*100=500>>500 cents
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: To recover her capital of 100 cents from a selling price of 20 cents per egg she has to sell 100/20 = <<100/20=5>>5 eggs
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: There were 30 eggs in the crate to start with so she will have 30-5 = <<30-5=25>>25 eggs left

explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'cents_per_dollar' (value: 100) was used instead of 'total_cents_capital' (value: 500).
